columns.name: Serial No.
columns.description: Unique identifier for each applicant record.

columns.name: GRE Score
columns.description: Graduate Record Examination score of the applicant (typically out of 340).

columns.name: TOEFL Score
columns.description: Test of English as a Foreign Language score of the applicant (typically out of 120).

columns.name: University Rating
columns.description: Rating of the university applied to, on a scale of 1 to 5.

columns.name: SOP
columns.description: Strength of the applicant’s Statement of Purpose, rated from 1 to 5.

columns.name: LOR
columns.description: Strength of the applicant’s Letter of Recommendation, rated from 1 to 5.

columns.name: CGPA
columns.description: Undergraduate Cumulative Grade Point Average, typically on a 10-point scale.

columns.name: Research
columns.description: Indicator of research experience (1 if the applicant has research experience, 0 otherwise).

columns.name: Chance of Admit
columns.description: Estimated probability of admission, ranging from 0.0 to 1.0.
